title: Teaching & researching: Computer-assisted language learning
excerpt: Computers play a crucial and rapidly evolving role in education, particularly in the area of language learning. Far from being a tool mimicking a textbook or teacher, Computer-Assisted Language Learning (CALL) has the power to transform language learning  ...

title: An Interactive Multimedia Based Instruction in Experimental Modelling: Integrating Matlab with an Authoring Program
authors: M Knudsen, JN Nielsen, J Østergaard, JD Nielsen… -
excerpt: Abstract: A CD-ROM based interactive multimedia instruction in experimental modelling for Danish Engineering School teachers is described. The content is based on a new sensitivity approach for direct estimation of physical parameters in linear and nonlinear dynamic  ...

title: Towards deeper learning with hand-crafted courseware
excerpt: Abstract Deep learning will ensure that tertiary students fully understand the implications of what they are taught. However, deep learning requires the students to actively engage in their education. It involves maintaining their motivation and building good learning  ...

title: A Computer-Based Instruction In Matlab
authors: M Knudsen, JN Nielsen, J Østergaard - Proc. 4th Int'l Conf. Computer  …
excerpt: Abstract: A computer based interactive instruction for a first introduction to Matlab has been developed and stored on CD-Rom. The program integrates Matlab and the authoring program Medi8or, so an active use of the Matlab command window is combined with text  ...
